ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there. Heritrix 3 has not been released yet, but as announced in a mail sent to the list on June 10 this year, you can download an alpha version of Heritrix

Heritrix 3 has not been released yet, but as announced in a mail =
sent to the list on June 10 this year, you can download an alpha version of=
 Heritrix 3.0.0 from 
http://builds.archive.org:8080/maven2/org/archive/her=
itrix/heritrix/3.0.0-alpha/
